Posts.EditableText:
Just so that certain people don't get the wrong idea, and the other MOD's/Alex suddenly notice more unlocked posts than usual (:D) etc, I'd just like to announce to the public;

"I is goin' on hole-ih-day! - Hu-hurrrk!"

That's right, 2 weeks, almost no access to the computer.
I may try to call in if I pass a cyber cafe, or if I can at any other time.
Other than that, I'm AWOL.

Ooo, I just noticed the "announcement" bit at the bottom.. Let's give it a try eh?

OK, well I hope everybody survives the next 2 weeks.
Bye.

Posts.EditableText:
Haha.. I've so far gone through london, cambridge, lincoln, and am now in a nice little town called Knaresborough (could be spelled incorrectly - not as if I care).

This has got to be the sweetest little village so far.
People are nice enough (so it seems) and the streets are nice.
Cambridge is DEFINATELY somewhere to go with a group of friends though, for a couple of days. And London also is a cool place if you have a group and enough time to explore.

I thought I'd spare a quick 20 mins browsing the interweb and see how things were.

Onto Blackpool next!

Oh, and I didn't have any holidays last year... Apart from 2 or 3 weeks before starting my old job - and I was sick in the middle of that.
I've been working solid since xmas, so I thought I deserved some time during the summer sun to have a holiday before I get suckered into a perminent position at my work place.

Posts.EditableText:
Blackpool ay?  Not much here mate... lol.

If you're in Blackpool over the weekend, look for a street named Topping Street.  Walk down until you see a sign above you that says LIQUID LOUNGE, and has grey double doors, with a metal step.

That's the club I work at.  If you're old enough try and get down Thursday, Friday, or Saturday.

If you manage to get on the net before then, PM me and we can meet up or something.

Posts.EditableText:
WOOT!! YAY tron, glad to see you're having fun, don't forget you're coming to manchester this weekend. I really can't wait to see you!!! *giggle* ok, i'm hyper...

Oh, I'd just thought i'd mention this, and I would like it if no-one was cruel and poked fun at me. On saturday my dad took us to the beach and the next day my legs, knees, ankles and feet had swollen so I couldn't move them. I was in constant pain and still am to a degree. The swellings come down a tiny bit in my feet and I've now got loadsd of huge blisters over the back of my legs, but my arms and back are healing nicely and peeling away. Ok, all that is a bit gross but it's not fun to go through, I only hope and better tomorrow for when tron comes *cries*, or we can't do fun stuff..... *sniff*
